step.cmd: Select the column you want to use to sort the data. (You can also select the grouping control in a grouped view to apply the sort to the grouping values.)
Click DataSort & FilterSort A-Z to sort the data in ascending order, or Sort Z-A to sort the data in descending order.

info.note: If you selected the grouping control in a grouped view, Ormetis Professional Edition applies the sort to the values in the grouping control. If you selected a column in the view, Ormetis Professional Edition applies the sort to the column.
